head-title: PMXG Smelters, refiners, distributors of gold, silver and metals.
head-description: PMXG is a leader in smelting gold, silver and other precious metals as well as testing. We can advise you with the purchase of bars of these metals.

footer.who-we-are_message: PMXG is a company that was founded in 2005, our team has over 25 years of experience and recognition in the Precious Metals Market. This experience that has allowed us to develop a work philosophy based on better serving our client.
